description: Roronoa Zoro is a pirate, former bounty hunter and one of the main protagonists of http://anidb.net/a69 [One Piece]. He was the first member to join the http://anidb.net/ch1954 [Straw Hat Pirates], and to date is widely acknowledged as the largest threat and the most dangerous member in the crew after http://anidb.net/ch474 [Luffy]. He is famed as a master swordsman, user of the Santouryuu style, and his great strength sometimes leads others to believe he must be the true captain. Being labeled as one of the "Monster Trio", he`s one of the top three fighters in the crew. Zoro is currently one of eleven pirates who have been referred to as "The Eleven Supernovas", having a bounty of 120,000,000 beli.
name: Roronoa Zoro
